from heapq import heapify, heappush, heappop

def find_dancing_pairs(n, sex, skills):
    cp = []
    r = []
    b = sex.count('B')
    N = min(n - b, b)
    for i in range(1, len(skills)):
        if sex[i] != sex[i - 1]:
            cp.append((abs(skills[i] - skills[i - 1]), i - 1, i))
    heapify(cp)
    prev = [i for i in range(-1, len(sex))]
    nxt = [i for i in range(1, len(sex) + 2)]
    trace = [0 for i in range(len(sex))]
    cnt = 1
    while cnt < N:
        temp = heappop(cp)
        (x, y) = (temp[1], temp[2])
        if trace[x] or trace[y]:
            continue
        r.append((x + 1, y + 1))
        cnt += 1
        (trace[x], trace[y]) = (1, 1)
        if prev[x] != -1 and nxt[y] != len(skills):
            nxt[prev[x]] = nxt[y]
            prev[nxt[y]] = prev[x]
            if sex[prev[x]] != sex[nxt[y]]:
                heappush(cp, (abs(skills[prev[x]] - skills[nxt[y]]), prev[x], nxt[y]))
    return (len(r), r)

    cp = []
    r = []
    b = sex.count('B')
    N = min(n - b, b)
    for i in range(1, len(skills)):
        if sex[i] != sex[i - 1]:
            cp.append((abs(skills[i] - skills[i - 1]), i - 1, i))
    heapify(cp)
    prev = [i for i in range(-1, len(sex))]
    nxt = [i for i in range(0, len(sex) + 2)]
    trace = [0 for i in range(len(sex))]
    cnt = 0
    while cnt < N:
        temp = heappop(cp)
        (x, y) = (temp[1], temp[2])
        if trace[x] or trace[y]:
            continue
        r.append((x + 1, y + 1))
        cnt += 1
        (trace[x], trace[y]) = (1, 1)
        if prev[x] != -1 and nxt[y] != len(skills):
            nxt[prev[x]] = nxt[y]
            prev[nxt[y]] = prev[x]
            if sex[prev[x]] != sex[nxt[y]]:
                heappush(cp, (abs(skills[prev[x]] - skills[nxt[y]]), prev[x], nxt[y]))
    return (len(r), r)

    nxt = [i for i in range(1, len(sex) + 2)]
    trace = [0 for i in range(len(sex))]
    cnt = 0
    while cnt < N:
        temp = heappop(cp)
        (x, y) = (temp[1], temp[2])
        if trace[x] or trace[y]:
            continue
        r.append((x + 1, y + 1))
        cnt += 1
        (trace[x], trace[y]) = (1, 1)
        if prev[x] != -1 and nxt[y] != len(skills):
            nxt[prev[x]] = nxt[y]
            prev[nxt[y]] = prev[x]
            if sex[prev[x]] != sex[nxt[y]]:
                heappush(cp, (abs(skills[prev[x]] - skills[nxt[y]]), prev[x], nxt[y]))
    return (len(r), r)
